title: Vanishing Acts
description: Jay is a good looking and successful, playboy type business man. On a routine trip to the mall he meets Vivian. He’s just looking for his next piece but they really hit if off and things get hot and steamy. She’s sexy, fun, outgoing, uninhibited and willing to try anything. Jay thinks he has made the ultimate conquest. That is until her wild side starts to get out of control. Jay doesn’t have a problem meeting women and tries to move on but he can’t get her out of his system. And when he almost does she lays it on him again and pulls him back in. However her desire for drugs, action and easy money only complicates things. She really loves Jay but can’t escape her wild life.
author: Rodney "Kamal" Jackson
